oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burns P. Phillips, Jr. oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Phillips, Burns P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An oral history excerpt of Burns Phillips, a veteran and former mathematics professor at MTSU. Phillips shares information about Vet Village.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vet Village; Campus life; G.I. Bill; World War II
